author: jmfotegui
title: Gig Economy Marketplace LatAm
description: LatAm faces a predominance of informal jobs. Around 50% of workers and 70% of recent jobs in LatAm countries are in informal conditions.
solution: Integrate informal LatAm workers to a Cardano-based Marketplace that will allow them to obtain income and preserve savings from inflation.
experience: LatAm digital platform startup founders, with a background in Business Intelligence, Project Management, Functional Analysis and IR/PR.
